col.name: ancestry_details
description: Population category defined using ancestry informative markers (AIMs) based on genetic/genomic data (descendants of `ancestry`)

col.name: curator
description: Curator name.

col.name: target_condition
description: Main phenotype(s)/condition(s) of interest for a given study

col.name: biomarker
description: A measurable and quantifiable characteristic or substance that serves as an indicator of a biological state, condition, or process within an organism.

col.name: disease
description: Reported disease/condition type(s) for a participant.  'Healthy' if disease(s)/condition(s) assessed under a given study is not detected

col.name: disease_details
description: Reported disease/condition type(s) for a participant in details. 'Healthy' if disease(s)/condition(s) assessed under a given study is not detected

col.name: feces_phenotype
description: Measurements collected from stool sample, including observation, chemical test, and diagnostic procedure
allowedvalues: Bristol stool form score (observable entity)|Calprotectin Measurement|Harvey-Bradshaw Index Clinical Classification

col.name: fmt_id
description: The id assigned to the FMT (Fecal microbiota transplantation) participants in the study

col.name: hla
description: Human leukocyte antigen (HLA) typing information

col.name: probing_pocket_depth
description: Depth of periodontal pocket measured at the different tooth's regions
allowedvalues: Buccal surface|Distal surface of tooth|Lingual surface of tooth|Mesial surface of tooth

col.name: smoker
description: Tobacco smoking behavior.  Assign `Non-smoker (finding)` only when the past smoking behavior information is unavailable.

col.name: treatment
description: Medication(s)/treatment(s) applied to the subject

col.name: uncurated_metadata
description: Additional information that doesn't belong to the existing fields

col.name: ancestry
description: Population category defined using ancestry informative markers (AIMs) based on genetic/genomic data (children of HANCESTRO:0004)

col.name: body_site
description: Subject's bodysite the given sample was collected from

col.name: control
description: Whether the sample is control, case, or not used in the study

col.name: country
description: Location where subject lives and/or data was collected

col.name: median_read_length
description: Median read length - calculated from raw data.

col.name: minimum_read_length
description: Minimum read length - calculated from raw data.

col.name: number_bases
description: Total number of bases sequenced in the sample - calculated from raw data.

col.name: number_reads
description: Number of final reads - calculated from raw data.

col.name: Sample Source ID
description: Sample identifier.

col.name: sequencing_platform
description: A scientific instrument used to automate the DNA sequencing process

col.name: subject_id
description: Subject identifier.

col.name: age
description: Age of the subject using the unit specified under 'age_unit' column

col.name: age_group
description: Age group classification: Newborn (< 1 month/28 days), Infant (>= 1 month & < 2 yrs), Child (>= 2 yrs & < 11 yrs), Adolescent (>= 11 yrs & < 18 yrs), Adult (>= 18 yrs & < 65 yrs), Elderly (>= 65 yrs)

col.name: age_unit
description: Unit of the subject's age specified under 'age' column

col.name: antibiotics_current_use
description: Antibiotics current usage.  `Yes` for currently using and `No` for not using

col.name: bmi
description: body mass index (EFO:0004340): An indicator of body density as determined by the relationship of BODY WEIGHT to BODY HEIGHT.  BMI=weight (kg)/height squared (m2).

col.name: body_site_details
description: Subject's body subsite the given sample was collected from.  Should be more specific information than bodysite

col.name: days_from_first_collection
description: Used for time series studies.

col.name: dietary_restriction
description: Dietary regime (partial match to SNOMED:182922004 or SNOMED:162536008)

col.name: disease_response_orr
description: Overal Response (ORR, NCIT:C96613): An assessment of the overall response of the disease to the therapy

col.name: disease_response_os
description: A measure of the time until death from any cause. (NCIT:C125201)

col.name: disease_response_os_unit
description: A time point used to observe overall survival (OS).

col.name: disease_response_pfs
description: Progression Free Survival (PFS, EFO:0004920): Progression free survival is a measurement from a defined time point e.g. diagnosis and indicates that the disease did not progress i.e. tumours did not increase in size and new incidences did not occur. PFS is usually used in analyzing results of treatment for advanced disease.

col.name: disease_response_pfs_month
description: A time point used to observe PFS. Unit is 'month'

col.name: disease_response_recist
description: Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST, DICOM:112022): Standard parameters to be used when documenting response of solid tumors to treatment; a set of published rules that define when cancer patients improve (`respond`), stay the same (`stable`), or worsen (`progression`) during treatments. (from www.recist.com)
allowedvalues: RECIST Complete Response|RECIST Partial Response|RECIST Progressive Disease|RECIST Stable Disease

col.name: dna_extraction_kit
description: Name of the DNA extraction kit

col.name: ecog_performance_status
description: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.  (NCIT:C105721)
allowedvalues: ECOG Performance Status 0|ECOG Performance Status 1|ECOG Performance Status 2|ECOG Performance Status 2 or Higher|ECOG Performance Status 3|ECOG Performance Status 4|ECOG Performance Status 5

col.name: family
description: A number identifying the family subjects belong; not corrected for meta-analyses.

col.name: family_role
description: Role in the family when multiple samples come from the same family but different persons.

col.name: fmt_role
description: The role of the FMT (Fecal microbiota transplantation) participants.  For recipient's samples, timing information (i.e., before or after FMT) is included as well.

col.name: lifestyle
description: to describe the lifestyle of non-westernized people

col.name: location
description: Free-form additional location information.

col.name: ncbi_accession
description: A semicolon-separated vector of NCBI accessions

col.name: neonatal_birth_weight
description: The mass or quantity of heaviness of an individual at BIRTH. (EFO:0004344) Unit is in gram.

col.name: neonatal_delivery_procedure
description: Description of the method by which a fetus is delivered. (NCIT:C81179)
allowedvalues: Elective Cesarean Delivery|Emergency Cesarean Delivery|Cesarean Section|Vaginal Delivery

col.name: neonatal_feeding_method
description: Infant feeding methods. 'Breastfeeding' refers feeding milk from human (include non-mother's and through bottle), 'Mixed_feeding' refers both breastfeeding and formula feeding, 'Exclusively Breastfeeding;Mixed Feeding' referes the cases where any breastfeeding was done but formula feeding information is unavailable.
allowedvalues: Exclusively Breastfeeding;Mixed Feeding;Exclusively Breastfeeding;Exclusively Formula Feeding;Mixed Feeding;No Breastfeeding

col.name: neonatal_gestational_age
description: The age of the conceptus, beginning from the time of FERTILIZATION. (EFO:0005112) Unit in weeks.

col.name: neonatal_preterm_birth
description: Birth when a fetus is less than 37 weeks and 0 days gestational age (NCIT:C92861).

col.name: obgyn_birth_control
description: Use of birth control pill (Oral Contraceptive)

col.name: obgyn_lactating
description: An indication that the subject is currently producing milk. (NCIT:C82463)

col.name: obgyn_menopause
description: An indicator as to whether the female subject is in menopause

col.name: obgyn_pregnancy
description: The pregnancy status of an individual.

col.name: pmid
description: Identifier of the main publication in PubMed

col.name: sex
description: Biological sex of the subject

col.name: study_name
description: Dataset name.

col.name: subcohort
description: Identifier of a sub-set of the cohort. Can be everything.

col.name: tumor_size_measurement
description: The measurement of the size of a tumor mass either clinically or in a surgically resected specimen.  (NCIT:C106303)

col.name: tumor_size_residual_measurement
description: A procedure that measures the size of a residual tumor mass.  (NCIT:C198194)

col.name: tumor_staging_ajcc
description: American Joint Committee on Cancer (tumor staging) (SNOMED:258236004). A system to describe the amount and spread of cancer in a patient's body

col.name: tumor_staging_tnm
description: Tumor-node-metastasis (TNM) tumor staging system (tumor staging) (SNOMED:254293002).A system to describe the amount and spread of cancer in a patient's body

col.name: westernized
description: Subject adopt or be influenced by the cultural, economic, or political systems of Europe and North America.

col.name: zigosity
description: Zigosity.
